events.comment: Call a function corresponding to the last entered event into the EventList Array.
Loop this layout until the EventsList Array is empty. Catch click events on the background only if the player has no clickable options available.

The Player DecisionActions are the only ones with a Go To action. These are also the only ones where the attributes change on the Decision page - because they require the outcome of the player first. All other actions (Random DecisionActions) on the Decision page are only for displaying, as they have already set the corresponding attribute changes on the Random page, e.g. they are purely informative.

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&leaderName&" introduces you to his other "&currentTitle&". 'You now join the ranks of my trusted lieutenants,' he says. 'I depend on all of you to work together for the glory of "&clanName&" clan.' The other "&currentTitle&" eye you speculatively."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}1{###}2

action.name: Call function
action.param: Data.Get("name")&" is a "&currentTitle&" of great renown. He controls a "&Function.Call("calculateLand", Data.Get("land"))&" fief, and commands "&Data.Get("samuraiCount")&" warriors; he is known throught the province as a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}Data.Get("index"){###}Data.Get("index")-1

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have a "&Function.Call("calculateLand", Data.Get("land"))&" fief and command "&Data.Get("samuraiCount")&" samurai. You are known as a warrior of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}0{###}2

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You receive word that the restless Ronin in your fief have united to revolt against you. You rush home to prepare your troops for battle!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The masterless Ronin flee before your victorious forces. That will teach these dogs what happens to those who defy "&playerIsTraveling&"."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your banners have fallen, and your armies are fleeing. All of your effors have been in vain. There is only one course a true samurai can take. You unsheathe your knife and prepare to commit seppuku."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The only honorable action left to you is to commit seppuku. Knowing your family will honor you for your act, you do the deed quickly and unflinchingly."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

sub-events.comment: When away from home, always call this.

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Considering your plan of action, you decide to"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY+200

action.name: Call function
action.param: "TravelWithTroops"{###}"Travel at the head of your troops."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You retire your position in favour of your heir. Gratefully giving up your former life of unrest and strife, you become a monk, devoting the rest of our days to the study of Zen."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "As your father's heir, you must now assume his responsibilities. Lord "&leaderName&" summons you to his court, and tells you, '"&playerName&", your family has a long and loyal history. Be brave, be resolute, and be obedient, and you will be a good retainer.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "As the heir to your father's domain, you are the new "&currentTitle&" of "&clanName&" clan. You summon your retainers and tell them, 'I am now lord "&clanName&". As your Master, I require only courage and obedience. In return, I promise you glory and a heroic death!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You demand a greater percentage of the rice harvest. Some peasants grumble, but you deliver a stern message reminding them that it is their duty to obey."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-250

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You donate some of your finest rice-growing land to the Buddhas. Lord "& leaderName &" states, 'It is good to see "& playerName &" perform an honorable act. "& playerName &" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor." {###}MenuX{###}MenuY+200

action.name: Call function
action.param: "A "&Function.Call("calculateLand",landAdded)&" amount of land is added to your control. You are now responsible for a "&Function.Call("calculateLand",Data.Get("land"))&" fief."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The action costs you a "&Function.Call("calculateLand",landSubstracted)&" amount of land. Your remaining land holdings are "&Function.Call("calculateLand",Data.Get("land"))&"."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Selecting loyal men of honor and fierceness, you equip "& samuraiCountAdded &" samurai."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You cannot afford to maintain more than the "& Data.Get("samuraiCount") &" samurai currently under your command."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The recent loss of land forces you to release "& samuraiCountSubstracted &" samurai from your service, as you can no longer afford to maintain them. The warriors become ronin, samurai without a lord."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Following the precepts of Sun Tzu's Art of War, you drill your troops, sharpening your skill of command and tactics."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "One can learn even from failure - though in this case not as much as from success."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Through dilligent practice with your teacher you improve your swordsmanship."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "One can learn even from failure - though in this case not as much as from success."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "With your army behind you, you march into the domain of Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" and demand that he swear allegiance to you!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" arrogantly refuses to surrender, thus sealing his fate. Your warriors prepare to attack."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" sees no hope in resistance, and agrees to surrender and become your vassal, saying it is an honor to join his destiny to yours. Perhaps he means it, but nonetheless you swiftly move to place your people in key positions governing Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s former lands."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Reeling, your forces fall back in dissaray. Defeated! You swear, by the spirits of your ancestors, that you'll avenge this infamous day."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have added Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s land to your control, though it cost you the lives of "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 2)&" warriors. You now reign over a "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 3)&" domain."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "With your army behind you, you march into the domain of Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" and demand that he swear allegiance to you!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The other daimyo are unwilling to surrender to your rule! They form a temporary alliance and join together to attack you. Prepare for battle!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The other daimyo see no hope in resistance, and agree to surrender and become your vassals, saying it is an honor to join his destiny to yours. Perhaps they mean it, but nonetheless you swiftly move to place your people in key positions governing all of Japan. You are now SHOGUN!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your banners have fallen, and your armies are fleeing. All of your effors have been in vain. There is only one course a true samurai can take. You unsheathe your knife and prepare to commit seppuku."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The final victory is yours! You are SHOGUN of all Japan! At last the land is once again united. The other daimyo are forced to bow to you and acknowledge your rule. All your former rivals are now completely subject to your will. With a triumphant laugh, you call in the scribes to record your first decrees."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You find that you are "&Data.Get("brideName")&"'s only suitor. You meet with the matchmaker, and after much genteel negotiation the marriage is arranged."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Woe! The matchmaker reports that "&brideName&" went to view a nearby waterfall and was kidnapped by bandits! They have been traced to an abandoned castle. If you save her, you will be regarded as an excellent prospect for a match. You decide to"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "InitiateReturnHome"{###}"Decline due to pressing concerns at home."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You try to force your body to keep attacking, but the wounds you have taken are too great, and the world goes black. When you awaken, your wounds have been tended and bound, but nothing can soothe the shame that burns in your heart."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Arrayed in your finest garments, you and your chosen bride, "&brideName&", are married by a Shinto priest before a gathering of family and retainers. The day is a whirl of gifts from friends and admirers, fine speeches and poems, and best of all the shy, adoring glances of your new wife."{###}MenuX+200{###}MenuY+200

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You receive word that your wife has borne you a daughter. You pray to your ancestors that she may be blessed with a happy life and an advantageous marriage."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You receive word that your wife has borne you a son. An heir to the house of "&playerName&"! You are filled with wamth and bright joy, as if the sun had risen in your heart. Your wife humbly suggests Daigoro as a name."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "'Stay out!' the assassin screams. 'Enter this room and you die!' Obviously he knows nothing of honor. Sword held before you, you leap into the room to face him. He yells as he rushed towards you. Your swords scrape together and their metal sings."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have preserved the honor of the clan. Word of your victory is spread far and wide. Lord "&leaderName&" states, 'it is good to see "&playerName&" perform an honorable act. "&playerName&" is a samurai of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor." {###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You try to force your body to keep attacking, but the wounds you have taken are too great, and the world goes black. When you awaken, your wounds have been tended and bound, but nothing can soothe the shame that burns in your heart."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The strange Samurai awaits you outside the gate. You bow to eachother, then draw your swords. You can tell by his stance that he is a master of the blade."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have preserved the honor of the clan. Word of your victory is spread far and wide. Lord "&leaderName&" states, 'it is good to see "&playerName&" perform an honorable act. "&playerName&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor." {###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You try to force your body to keep attacking, but the wounds you have taken are too great, and the world goes black. When you awaken, your wounds have been tended and bound, but nothing can soothe the shame that burns in your heart."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You march over the border to attack the clan's enemy. "&enemyClanName&" knew you were coming, and has arranged his forces to meet you. You form up your own troops, then give the order to attack!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The enemy flees before your victorious forces - the power of "&enemyClanName&" is broken. Lord "&LeaderName& " rewards you by adding a large piece of the captured territory to your fief."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Reeling, your forces fall back in dissaray. Defeated! You swear, by the spirits of your ancestors, that you'll avenge this infamous day."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your army marches to the pass that is blocked by the enemy. You address your troops - 'Think only of your enemy, not of yourself. To think of losing is to lose! Set your mind to victory! Now, attack!'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The enemy flees before your victorious forces - the power of the enemy is broken. Lord "&LeaderName& " rewards you by adding a large piece of the captured territory to your fief."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Reeling, your forces fall back in dissaray. Defeated! You swear, by the spirits of your ancestors, that you'll avenge this infamous day."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your army marches to the pass that is blocked by the enemy. You address your troops - 'Think only of your enemy, not of yourself. To think of losing is to lose! Set your mind to victory! Now, attack!'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Victorious, you raise a pennant with the symbol of clan "&clanName&" over the fortress. Lord "&LeaderName& " rewards you by adding a large piece of the captured territory to your fief."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Reeling, your forces fall back in dissaray. Defeated! You swear, by the spirits of your ancestors, that you'll avenge this infamous day."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You are commited - the time for planning is over. Death will come to many today. But you are calm, for only the tranquil mind can be victorious. You array your troops, and give the command to attack."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You victorious troops chase "&Data.Get("name")&"'s soldiers from the field. Such is the fate of all who defy "&playerName&" !"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Reeling, your forces fall back in dissaray. Defeated! You swear, by the spirits of your ancestors, that you'll avenge this infamous day."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

sub-events.comment: Add scenario in which attack is excusable (family member kidnapped)

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&leaderName&" has ruled that there was no excuse for your attack on "&Data.Get("name")&". It was a dishonorable act that no faithful retainer would untertake."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&leaderName&" has arrayed his troops outside the walls of his castle. Defeat his soldiers, and the castle will be yours. The alternative is unthinkable!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "His army scattered, the lord retreats into his castle, where he is defended by the last of his household guards. But you are close behind him, and you will not be thwarted. You want his head!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Reeling, your forces fall back in dissaray. Defeated! You swear, by the spirits of your ancestors, that you'll avenge this infamous day."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have violated the sacred duty of a retainer to his lord. As an example to others who might contemplate disloyalty, your lord orders your entire family exterminated."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You confront the bandits in the village they planned to despoil. Contemptuously, you draw your katana and attack."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Such dogs as these bandits cannot stand before a noble samurai! They break before the ferocity of your attack, and you cut them down as they flee. Lord "&leaderName&" states, 'It is good to see "&playerName&" perform an honorable act. "&playerName&" is a "&currentTitle&" of " &Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Reeling, your forces fall back in dissaray. Defeated! You swear, by the spirits of your ancestors, that you'll avenge this infamous day."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You accompany a group of travelers as it leaves the castle. The band of rogue ronin appears, and arrogantly starts across the rice paddies toward you. You draw your sword and move to meet them."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The masterless samurai fall before your flashing blade, and a stain on the honor of clan "&clanName&" is removed. Lord "&leaderName&" states. 'It is good to see "&playerName&" perform an honorable act. "&playerName&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You try to force your body to keep attacking, but the wounds you have taken are too great, and the world goes black. When you awaken, your wounds have been tended and bound, but nothing can soothe the shame that burns in your heart."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Desperate peasants hold the priest in a house near a rice field. Determined to succeed or die, you draw your sword and attack."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The priest is most grateful for beeing freed. 'I will tell everyone I meet of your courage and awesome skill. It is a privilege to be rescued by a samurai such as you.' Lord "&leaderName&" states 'It is good to see "&playerName&" perform an honorable act. He is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You try to force your body to keep attacking, but the wounds you have taken are too great, and the world goes black. When you awaken, your wounds have been tended and bound, but nothing can soothe the shame that burns in your heart."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

event-group.description: For IkkoIkki, Bandits Battles + Peasant revolts
event-group.title: HelpDefendBattle

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your offer to help "&Data.Get("name")&" is graciously accepted. Indeed, he urges you to accept the generalship of the combined forces. Together you are certain to rout the intruders."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Under your leadership, the combined forces rout the invaders. Together, you and "&Data.Get("name")&" survey the heads of your defeated foes."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Reeling, your forces fall back in disarray. Defeated! You swear, by the spirits of your ancestors, that you'll avenge this infamous day."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your offer to help "&Data.Get("name")&" is graciously accepted. You accompany a group of travelers as it leaves the castle. The band of rogue ronin appears, and arrogantly starts across the rice paddies toward you. You draw your sword and move to meet them."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The masterless samurai fall before your flashing blade, and a stain on the honor of clan "&clanName&" is removed. Lord "&leaderName&" states 'It is good to see "&playerName&" perform an honorable act. "&playerName&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You try to force your body to keep attacking, but the wounds you have taken are too great, and the world goes black. When you awaken, your wounds have been tended and bound, but nothing can soothe the shame that burns in your heart."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Distracting the guards with a tossed stone, you sneak through the outer gates. Under a willow in the garden, you review your plan." {###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "InitiateTreachery"{###}"Treachery against the lord of this manor."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "InitiateKidnap"{###}"Take a hostage from the lord's family."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have successfully rescued your "&Data.Get("kidnappedPlayerFamily")&" from the house of "&Data.Get("name")&". A stain on your honor has been removed!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The "&pursuedTitle&" has presented "&Data.Get("name")&" with an heirloom sword; he will be expected to wear it when next he visits lord "&clanName&". You plan to find this sword and take it. Anyone who sees you must die."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "An envoy from the "&pursuedTitle&" is sleeping within. To bring shame to "&Data.Get("name")&", you must find the envoy, and kill him as he sleeps. No one who sees you can be allowed to live. "{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: Data.Get("name")&" has appeared at court without the heirloom sword the "&pursuedTitle&" had presented him! He is dishonored."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Word spreads that the "&pursuedTitle&"'s envoy has been killed while sleeping in "&Data.Get("name")&"'s castle! The "&pursuedTitle&" stated that "&Data.Get("name")&" is a dissapointment."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have been captured in the house of "&Data.Get("name")&" while obviously engaged on a mission of treachery. The daimyo has no choice but to order you to commit seppuku. You have until sunset to prepare yourself for death."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "More than anyone else, the peasants hate and fear "&Data.Get("name")&"'s tax collector. If you can find him and slay him, this may incite the peasants to rise up and defy their lord."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Freed of the tax collector, and realizing that the entire village will be punished for his death, the peasants rise up and declare themselves independent of their samurai lord. It will be expensive for "&Data.Get("name")&" to put them back in their place."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have been caught at the estate of "&Data.Get("name")&" while engaged in some sort of impropriety. You agree upon a ransom of a small piece of land and are allowed to return home. Word of your dishonorable deed spreads around."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Somewhere within, the family of "&Data.Get("name")&" is sleeping. You intend to find them and spirit one away. "&Data.Get("name")&" will not be so arrogant once you hold a member of his family!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY+440

sub-events.comment: If all family members are kidnapped, then player will encounter the house lord. If he is away, he has to be put back home.
Every now and then, the player encounters his rival instead of his family - if the rival has a high swordsmanship and could forsee the betrayal.

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have been caught at the estate of "&Data.Get("name")&" while engaged in some sort of impropriety. You agree upon a ransom of a small piece of land and are allowed to return home. Word of your dishonorable deed spreads around."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have successfully kidnapped "&Data.Get("daughter1Name")&", the daughter of "&Data.Get("name")&". You treat your hostage with respect, but receive only cold courtesy in return."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have successfully kidnapped "&Data.Get("son1Name")&", the son and heir of "&Data.Get("name")&". You treat your hostage with respect, but receive only cold courtesy in return."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You inform lord "&Data.Get("name")&" that his wife "&Data.Get("wifeName")&" is now an honor guest in your home."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You adjust your two swords so they won't clank, then slip down the hall, moving from shadow to shadow. You plan a dangerous deed, to assassinate"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You adjust your two swords so they won't clank, then slip down the hall, moving from shadow to shadow. You plan a dangerous deed, to assassinate"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Somewhere inside, "&Data.Get("name")&" sleeps. You must find his room, slay him, and escape without being identified. If a guard sees you, you must still his tongue by taking his head."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY+440

sub-events.comment: This is when you have found your victim.

action.name: Call function
action.param: "As you prepare for combat, you search lord "&Data.Get("name")&"'s eyes for anger or contempt, but find only sadness. Your hands tremble as you grip your sword. Lord "&Data.Get("name")&"'s hands are steady."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "It is "&Data.Get("name")&"! It seems fate has decreed an encounter between you two. Recognizing you, he bows, then draws his sword."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your lawful lord lies dead at your feet. Your head spins with conflicting emotions - you feel deep shame at having committed such a terrible crime, yet at the same time you feel a joyous liberation."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: Data.Get("name")&" has been found slain by an assassin. What kind of a dishonorable dog would attack his enemy in secret like this? You review your own security arrangments."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have violated the sacred duty of a retainer to his lord. As an example to others who might contemplate disloyalty, your lord orders your entire family exterminated."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have been captured in the house of "&Data.Get("name")&" while obviously engaged on a mission of treachery. The daimyo has no choice but to order you to commit seppuku. You have until sunset to prepare yourself for death."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You meet "&Data.Get("name")&" in a pleasant room overlooking a goldfish pond. You both sit; discreet servants bring food and drink. You tell "&Data.Get("name"){###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "InitiateTea"{###}"That you wish to invite him to a tea ceremony."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "InitiateInsult"{###}"That he is a coward whose ancestors hauled dung."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "InitiateMarriage"{###}"That you beg permission to marry his daughter."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "InitiateAskFavour"{###}"That he must obey your will in a certain matter."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You tell "&Data.Get("name")&", 'I would be highly gratified if you would heed my little request.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "InitiateRequest"{###}"'Please lend me income from your lands.'"{###}"RequestIncreaseLands"

action.name: Call function
action.param: "InitiateRequest"{###}"'Please proclaim your high esteem for me.'"{###}"RequestIncreaseHonor"

sub-events.comment: One of the two requests is passed on, or the rival refuses

action.name: Call function
action.param: Data.Get("name")&" agrees to send you the income from a small piece of his land."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: Data.Get("name")&" praises you at court - your reputation is enhanced."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: Data.Get("name")&" says, 'Sadly, I cannot acquiesce to your desires at the present time'. In a grim voice, he adds - 'It is wisdom to be sure of one's own position before making requests of others.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" stares at you for a full minute, then nods and says, 'I would be proud to call you my son.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" stares at you for a full minute, then shakes his head and stands up. 'I deeply regret to refuse you, but you cannot have my daughter.' He utters nothing further while seeing you to the door."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: Data.Get("name")&" graciously accepts your invitation. He arrives at your tea-house at the appointed time and praises its simple elegance. You perform the tea ritual perfectly, and he compliments you on your skill. You demean you abilities, but inside you are exultant. The beauty of the ceremony has helped erase any bad feelings between you."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&Data.Get("name")&"'s refusal is curt, barely polite. The bad feelings between you are like an uncrossable chasm."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "'You cannot so insult my family and live!' "&Data.Get("name")&" snarls. 'I challenge you to a duel of honor!'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: Data.Get("name")&" hesitates. He glances at your sword and starts to sweat. Then he smiles nervously and says, 'Ah, you are making a little joke. Most amusing.' His retainers stare in disbelief; their lord is refusing to avenge a deliberate insult! Lord "&leaderName&" states, 'I am dissapointed in "&Data.Get("name")&"'s behaviour. "&Data.Get("name")&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "It is over; your opponent lies dead on the ground before you. It might just as easily have been you. Truly, life is no more lasting than a flower in the spring."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You try to force your body to keep attacking, but the wounds you have taken are too great, and the world goes black. When you awaken, your wounds have been tended and bound, but nothing can soothe the shame that burns in your heart."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Considering your plan of action, you decide to"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You receive a message from Lord "&Data.Get("name")&" - 'You are a samurai of great honor and good prospects. If I were as fortunate as you, I would worry that a jealous rival would somehow bring me dishonor. However, if you were to praise an unfortunate like me for all to hear, I am sure you would have only good luck.' You decide to"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "FollowThreats"{###}"Speak well of Lord "&Data.Get("name")&"'s honor and courage."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You receive a message from Lord "&Data.Get("name")&" - 'One I heard a tale of two rich brothers. One donated his excess land to Buddha, but the other selfishly kept his wealth. When bandits came to town, the rich brother was killed and robbed, but the other brother was left alone. Is this not an interesting story?' You decide to"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "FollowThreats2"{###}"Make a large donation of land to the temples."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You cautiously decide it best to make the donation."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You cautiously decide it best to speak well of Lord "&Data.Get("name")&"'s honor and courage on your next visit at lord "&leaderName&"'s castle."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The troops of Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" have surrounded your estate, so you gather your forces and march out to meet them. The sun shiney brilliantly. It is a good day for battle!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your troops are routed, your power is broken. Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&", your conqueror, insists that you swear fealty to him. There is only one possible answer you can give."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You victorious troops chase "&Data.Get("name")&"'s soldiers from the field. Such is the fate of all who defy "&playerName&" !"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "It's the dead of the night. You hear a muffled scream, and are instantly awake - could there be an intruder in the house? You pick up your sword and slide back the door."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "It is "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"! It seems fate has decreed an encounter between you two. Recognizing you, he bows, then draws his sword."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You feel the fatal blow, and even as you die you try to impale your enemy on your sword. But it is the end. Though a man has but one life, his name lives on forever!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You kill every one of the dogs. As you inspect the bodies of your enemies, you recognize the face of "&Data.Get("name")&". Such is the fate of all who dare challenge "&playerName&"."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" was caught at the estate of Lord " &EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 2)&" while engaging in some sort of impropriety. Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has been released; it is said that his family paid a small piece of land as a ransom. Samurai are saying that Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"' behaviour is disappointing. Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&currentTitle&" of " &EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 2)&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has overrun the territory previously held by Lord " &EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 2)&". 'It is my duty to see that order is established in this unruly area,' states Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Due to Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" recent honor loss, "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1,2)&" samurai have left his service."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" recent loss of rice-growing land has forced him to release "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1,2)&" samurai from his service, as he can no longer support them properly."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" added a " &EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 2)&" amount of land to his control. He is now responsible for a " &EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 3)&" fief."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" increased his available wealth by raising the rice tax in his fief, though the peasants already complain of the burden. It would take but little to push them into open rebellion."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has gained much respect by donating land to the priests of Buddha. It is good to see Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" do an honorable deed. Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&CurrentTitle&"of " &EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 2)&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is traveling by himself. 'If it is my fate to win honour on this journey, will it not be greater if I do so alone?"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" abdicated in favour of his heir, withdrawing from public affairs to become a monk."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" and his troops are on the move."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is attempting to conquer the province of XYZ."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has conquered the formerly independent province of XYZ."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s attempt to subdue the province of XYZ has ended in failure."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

sub-events.comment: The params 999 and 3 are the brideImage and the position (right)

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You are approached by a matchmaker. 'I have the perfect bride for you,' he says, 'a modest woman from a family of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("brideHonor"))&" honor who has been well trained in the skills of household management. Her name is "&Data.Get("brideName")&", and her father requires only a very small gift of land. She awaits suitors at Lord "&leaderName&"'s castle."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}999{###}3

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Calamity! Your "&Data.Get("kidnappedPlayerFamily")&" has been kidnapped from your estate! You soon receive a message from "&Data.Get("name")&" stating that your "&Data.Get("kidnappedPlayerFamily")&" has come to visit him, and if you support him in the future it will not be an unpleasant stay."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your informats tell you that Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has taken a member of Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s family hostage."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has married Murasame in a traditional ceremony."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "A son and heir was born for lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You are now the clear favourite for the next promotion to "&pursuedTitle&". Already the poison of jealousy has begun to spread among your rivals."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "As a result of recent events, your standing in the clan has improved. You plan the changes you will make when you become "&pursuedTitle&"!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You are the leading daimyo of Japan. The Shogunate seems almost within your grasp!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your standing in the clan has worsened. Could your rivals have been responsible for this loss of face? Perhaps they need to be taken down a peg or two!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Fate has dealt you a nasty blow - you are now last in the race for "&pursuedTitle&". How much greater will be the glory when you snatch victory from the jaws of defeat"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Horrible news! Lord "&leaderName&" has been assassinated, doubtless by a ninja sent by some dishonorable enemy. There is much speculation as to who will step into Lord "&leaderName&"'s place." {###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&uppercase(clanName)&" selects you as his new "&pursuedTitle&"! You accept the honor with apparent gravity, but inside your heart swells with pride."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}0{###}2

action.name: Call function
action.param: Data(promotedRival).Get("name")&" is proclaimed the new "&pursuedTitle&". You vow that next time the title will be yours!"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" was killed while leading his men against enemy warriors who struck by surprise. All agree it was a brave and honorable death."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" decided to chastise a group of ronin who tried to rob him, and was slain in the ensuing melee. Though he failed, he died like a true samurai."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has been found slain by an assassin. What kind of a dishonorable dog would attack his enemy like this? You review your own security arrangements."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

sub-events.comment: Does this work ok yet? Also needs "CreateStoryForDecisionWithImage"

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" s heir, "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1,2)&", has assumed leadership of his house."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" s heir, "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1,2)&", is too young to assume leadership of his house."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&leaderName&" announces that "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1,1)&" will take his former retainer's place. '"&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1,1)&" is a worthy samurai who knows his duty,' the "&pursuedTitle&" states."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&leaderName&" announces that "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1,1)&" will take his former place. '"&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1,1)&" is a worthy samurai who knows his duty,' the new "&pursuedTitle&" states."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "An assassin sent to slay lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has been cornered in a tower room of lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s castle. One courageous enough to engage this assassin in single combat would surely gain much honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has slain the assassin in Lord 's castle. Lord states 'It is good to see "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" perform an honorable act. "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" faced the cornered criminal, but was killed in the duel. 'He was a fine samurai, who understood the way of the warrior,' announces Lord "&LeaderName&"."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "A strange samurai of surpassing skill has arrived at Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s castle. He calls for a challenger to duel with him to defend the honor of the clan."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" accepted the challenge of the swordmaster, and slew him in single combat. All admire the brave and skillful Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&". It is widely said that it is good to see Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" perform an honorable act. Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" accepted the challenge of the swordmaster, but was killed in the duel. 'He was a fine samurai, who understood the way of the warrior,' announces Lord "&LeaderName&"."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "A moderate unit of Ikko-ikki is attacking the holdings of "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&", inflaming the peasants and calling for his overthrow. "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" urges all true samurai to join him in crushing the invaders."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}Data.Get("index"){###}1

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is facing the rebellious monks."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has driven the intruders from his domain. It is good to see "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" do an honorable deed. "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s attempt to defeat the enemy forces has ended in ignominious failure."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "A moderate gang of bandits menaces the peasants in "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s fief. He rushes home to take personal command of his warriors. "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" urges all true samurai to join him in crushing the invaders."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}Data.Get("index"){###}1

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has driven the intruders from his domain. It is good to see "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" do an honorable deed. "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s attempt to defeat the menacing bandits has ended in ignominious failure."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You receive word that the restless Ronin in lord "&Data.Get("name")&"'s fief have united to revolt against him. Lord "&Data.Get("name")&" rushes home to prepare his troops for battle. He urges all true samurai to join him."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}Data.Get("index"){###}1

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has driven the intruders from his domain. It is good to see "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" do an honorable deed. "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s attempt to defeat the revolting ronin has ended in ignominious failure."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Message from "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" - 'My fief is under attack by a moderate group of Ikeda samurai. I regard this, not as misfortune, but as an opportunity for glory!' "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" urges all true samurai to join him in crushing the invaders."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}Data.Get("index"){###}1

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is facing the Ikeda samurai alone."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has driven the intruders from his domain. It is good to see "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" do an honorable deed. "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s attempt to defeat the enemy forces has ended in ignominious failure."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" declares that Takeaki of the neighboring Izumi province is sowing the seeds of a very large invasion force. A storm should destroy this crop before it ripens. One undertaking this task should march to Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s castle."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}1{###}1

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Another victory for "&clanName&" clan! "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has defeated the enemy forces, and lord "&leaderName&" has awarded him a moderate piece of the conquered territory."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s attempt to defeat the enemy forces has ended in ignominious failure."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" would be pleased if a certain fortress in Izumi with a very large garrison were captured. Anyone interested in this task should come to Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s castle."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}1{###}1

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Another victory for "&clanName&" clan! "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has defeated the enemy forces, and lord "&leaderName&" has awarded him a moderate piece of the conquered territory."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s attempt to defeat the enemy forces has ended in ignominious failure."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "A border fortress is besieged by a very large force of sohei who have laid claim to that area. These monks should be forced to return to their own temple lands. Volunteers should call upon Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}1{###}1

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Another victory for "&clanName&" clan! "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has defeated the enemy forces, and lord "&leaderName&" has awarded him a moderate piece of the conquered territory."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s attempt to defeat the enemy forces has ended in ignominious failure."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" says, 'A large body of enemies holds the pass into Izumi. Who will sweep them away for me?' He will receive volunteers at his castle."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}1{###}1

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has liberated the pass single-handedly! Lord "&leaderName&" stated 'It is good to see "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" do an honorable deed. "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor.'"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&"'s attempt to defeat the enemy forces has ended in ignominious failure."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "An envoy from Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" says that a rebellious band of peasants has abducted a priest and threatens to kill him unless all peasants' debts to moneylenders are canceled. Is there no one brave enough to rescue the priest? Such a one should call on Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" at his castle."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}1{###}1

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" has cut down the rebellious peasants and freed their hostage, the priest. 'Here is a mighty warrior,' proclaims the priest. 'In him you see all the virtues of the Way of the Samurai. Lord "&leaderName&" states, 'It is good to see "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" perform an honorable act. "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor", Data.Get("honor"))&" honor.'" {###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" tried to save the priest held hostage by the peasants, but was killed in the attempts. Of "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&", Lord "&LeaderName&" later said, 'He knew his duty, and I honor him no less because he failed to achieve his goal'."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "A band of ronin has been menacing travelers on the high road. The one who brought an end to these outrages would surely be regarded as a hero. Those wishing to show their mettle should call on Lord "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" at his castle."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100{###}1{###}1

action.name: Call function

action.name: Call function
action.param: "On your return from inspecting a border fortress, your party is stopped by a hard-looking group of armed men. 'We are ronin, and must live as we can,' they say. 'Give us your valuables and all will be well, but if you defy us, we will become violent!' You decide to"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "AvoidTrouble"{###}"Allow your retainers to deal with this problem."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Your advisor tells you that a master swordsman has arrived in the district and is defeating all comers. He has said 'I am dissapointed to find that this province has no worthy opponents.' You decide to"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "AvoidTrouble"{###}"Allow your retainers to deal with this problem."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "There is a sudden commotion in the hall, and then a desperate samurai bursts through the door. He shakes his bloody sword at you and shouts 'You'll never behead me for my crimes! Stand and fight, if you have any honor!' You decide to"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "AvoidTrouble"{###}"Allow your retainers to deal with this problem."

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You have preserved the honor of the clan. Word of your victory is spread far and wide. Lord "&leaderName&" states, 'it is good to see "&playerName&" perform an honorable act. "&playerName&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor." {###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The masterless samurai fall before your flashing blade, and a stain on the honor of clan "&clanName&" is removed. Lord "&leaderName&" states. 'It is good to see "&playerName&" perform an honorable act. "&playerName&" is a "&currentTitle&" of "&Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Another trimph for the house of "&ClanName&"! Far and wide it is said that you are truly one of the greatest "&CurrentTitle&" who ever lived. It is widely said that is is good to see Lord "&PlayerName&" perform an honorable act. However, Lord "&PlayerName&" is a "&CurrentTitle&" of "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" honor."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "The story of your deed spreads rapidly, and becomes the subject of a popular poem titled '"&playerName&"'s Blade'. It is widely said that 'it is good to see "&playerName&" perform an honorable act. "&playerName&" is a "&currentTitle&" of " &Function.Call("calculateHonor",Data.Get("honor"))&" honor." {###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You try to force your body to keep attacking, but the wounds you have taken are too great, and the world goes black. When you awaken, your wounds have been tended and bound, but nothing can soothe the shame that burns in your heart."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

sub-events.comment: If player has heir, he takes over.

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You are a Shogun of "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 1)&" honor You have "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 2)&" land holdings in "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 3)&" provinces You are a General of "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 4)&" ability You command "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 5)&" warriors Your formal rivals command "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 6)&" warriors You have "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 7)&" heir. You cut through all resistance like a difficultyLevel Shogun points: "&EventsList.At(EventsList.Width-1, 8)&""{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "You are Shogun for five years, and during that time you spread peace throughout the islands. The daimyo grow resentful of your regulations, and finally you are overthrown by the most powerful warlord. Historians look back on your reign as a brief golden age."{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100

action.name: Call function
action.param: "Would you like the scribes to record your success on the Scroll of Honor?"{###}MenuX{###}MenuY-100
